content: वारण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [वृ-ल्यु ल्युट् वा] Warding off, resisting, opposing. --णं {@--1@} Warding off, restraining, obstructing; न भवति बिसतंतुर्वारणं वारणानां <ls>Bh. 2. 17.</ls> {@--2@} An obstacle, impediment. {@--3@} Resistance, opposition. {@--4@} Defending, guarding, protecting. --णः {@--1@} An elephant; न भवति बिसतंतुर्वारणं वारणानां <ls>Bh. 2. 17</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 70</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 93</ls>; <ls>Śi. 18. 56.</ls> {@--2@} An armour, mail-coat.
